code: /** Teacher actions */import{TeacherService}from"../services/teacher";import{TeacherConstants}from"../constants/teacher";import AlertActions from"./alert";export var get_all_courses=function get_all_courses(teacher_id){return function(dispatch){TeacherService.get_all_courses(teacher_id).then(function(response){dispatch(AlertActions.success("Success"));dispatch({type:TeacherConstants.GET_ALL_COURSES,payload:response});}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);dispatch(AlertActions.error(error));});};};export var get_teacher_pending_classwork=function get_teacher_pending_classwork(teacher_id,classroom_id){return function(dispatch){TeacherService.get_teacher_pending_classwork(teacher_id,classroom_id).then(function(response){dispatch(AlertActions.success("Success"));dispatch({type:TeacherConstants.GET_ALL_PENDING,payload:response});}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);dispatch(AlertActions.error(error));});};};export var get_teacher_unmarked_classwork=function get_teacher_unmarked_classwork(teacher_id,classroom_id){return function(dispatch){TeacherService.get_teacher_unmarked_classwork(teacher_id,classroom_id).then(function(response){dispatch(AlertActions.success("Success"));dispatch({type:TeacherConstants.GET_ALL_UNMARKED,payload:response});}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);dispatch(AlertActions.error(error));});};};var TeacherActions={get_all_courses:get_all_courses,get_teacher_pending_classwork:get_teacher_pending_classwork,get_teacher_unmarked_classwork:get_teacher_unmarked_classwork};export default TeacherActions;
